page.title: 12THE GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: A) {BRITISH BULLDOG: { }This is a game where the object is to get from one side of a field to the other. One person starts off in the middle of the field and it is his job to catch the others as they try to cross. When all have been caught the game is over the last person to be caught being the winner. B) {King: The object of this game is for one person (The King) to catch all the others, he does this by hitting them with a ball, the last person to be hit being the winner. There are many variations of this game limiting the parts of the body you can hit, using different sized balls etcetera but the basic idea remains the same. C){ COMPUTERS: Games on the home computer have become very popular in recent years.
